attributes.action: No confidence in our PM Mrs T May in dealing with the negotiations of Brexit
attributes.background: Following the referendum in 2016 the government promised after the vote the UK would leave the EU on March 29th 2019. This is supposed to be a democratic country but will the wishes of the people who voted to leave, be adhered to.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.
